field_xmatch_file.comment: Path to field cross-matched reference file

reference_dataset_code.comment: Identifier for the site/enclosure to be used as the photometry reference dataset, cannot be None [e.g. lsc_doma]

photometry_data_file.comment: Filename for output of multi-band photometry [or None]

target_field_id.comment: Field star ID of a specific star or None

target_ra.comment: Right ascension of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

target_dec.comment: Declination of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

selection_radius.comment: Maximum radius used to select stars close to the target location. Set to zero for no selection.

plot_selected_radius_only.comment: If true, plot only stars within the selection radius, otherwise any selected stars will be over-plotted.

plot_i_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for plots

i_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-i magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_r_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for plots

r_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-r magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_g_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for plots

g_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-g magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_ri_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for plots

ri_sigma_max.comment: Maximum (r-i) colour uncertainty to use for plots

plot_gr_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for plots

gr_sigma_max.comment: Maximum (g-r) colour uncertainty to use for plots

plot_gi_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for plots

gi_sigma_max.comment: Maximum (g-i) colour uncertainty to use for plots
